Create temporary files and directories.

Copyright © 2010 Mochi Media, Inc.

Authors: Bob Ippolito (bob@mochimedia.com).

Description

Create temporary files and directories. Requires crypto to be started.

Function Index

gettempdir/0Get a usable temporary directory using the first of these that is a directory: $TMPDIR, $TMP, $TEMP, "/tmp", "/var/tmp", "/usr/tmp", ".".
mkdtemp/0
mkdtemp/3
rmtempdir/1

Function Details

gettempdir/0

gettempdir() -> string()

Get a usable temporary directory using the first of these that is a directory: $TMPDIR, $TMP, $TEMP, "/tmp", "/var/tmp", "/usr/tmp", ".".

mkdtemp() -> any()

mkdtemp/3

mkdtemp(Suffix, Prefix, Dir) -> any()

rmtempdir/1
